name: Crash Drivers
description:
Become a destruction pro and wreck other drivers cars.

Tap left or right to drive in that direction.
Drift with your car to make your ball swing and crush your opponents.

The more rivals you crash, the bigger your ball gets. And you know what they say about cars with big balls… they’re harder do destroy.

Crash the highest number of enemies to get the most point, and defeat all other players in this .io arena game.
It’s time to smash!
